None.Name: Tainted Intoxication
None.Description: Infuses a strong poison in the targeted enemy unit whose life points will be reduced by 23 per second. Lasts for 15 seconds. The damage dealt by this substance cannot be warded off with the help of damage reducing abilities because it is able to circumvent every buff or protective shield.
